title: Jafra Adorisse Night Eau de Parfum The NIght Perfum For Womens
description: The night begins with your arrival in this intoxicating scent made for the night. Spellbinding notes of Bergamot captivate his senses while the whisper of Neroli and the addictive haze of creamy white chocolate have them hanging on your every word. Linger to the dawn in the beautifully bold Adorisse Night. Eau de Parfum. | 1.7 fl. oz.
